title: Optimized Design for VR-Based Secondary Science Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic secondary science concepts (physics/chemistry) and fundamental VR device operation skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based VR learning environment. Activities centered on experimental simulations and conceptual visualization

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce scientific experiment processes in VR environments with at least 85% accuracy
Learners improve learning efficiency by 20% by applying VR-based cognitive load management strategies
Learners can compare the educational effectiveness of minimalist design and high-realism design

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
